ratings.comment: I actually attend Edgewood College where she also teaches, but Stacy is honestly amazing. She made things really easy to understand. Was readily available when I needed her help with homework or other questions. Tests really are not bad if you simply study. Slow email responder, but quick to text back if you have a question with homework, etc.
She was a very organized teacher.  Always came prepared with activities planned for class.  She is very helpful and all tests are fair.  If you study and want to learn she is great!

Awesome instructor. Best experience I've had in a Spanish class. She is more than fair, the class discussions are fun, and the class moves. Even brought her Spanish-fluent daughter to class to sing songs to us. Stacy speaks quickly, but with a nice yankee accent so it's easy to understand, relatively speaking. You would be lucky to be in her class.

Best Spanish professor I have had!  Also, it is worth talking to her outside of class, 'cause she will listen to your situation if you have a problem, and is very helpful.  Really nice person, and great class!
Definately makes spanish painless, very good teacher overall.  From USA, so not too heavy of an accent.  Grade-wise, very fair.  Keeps class moving rapidly, and is usually interesting.
Wonderful, interesting person and teacher.  Very nice and easy to understand.  If you don't understand something, she's ready and willing to help you out.  I recommend her highly!
